alert.note: Alert for Attala; Choctaw; Leake; Madison; Neshoba; Rankin; Scott; Smith; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 8:26AM CST until March 03 at 9:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Leake County in central Mississippi... Rankin County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Smith County in central Mississippi... Attala County in central Mississippi... Western Winston County in east central Mississippi... Scott County in central Mississippi... Western Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... Eastern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 930 AM CST. * At 825 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kosciusko to near Goshen Springs to near Whites, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 823 AM CST, wind gusts of 60 mph were reported at the Jackson-Evers International Airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Pearl, Brandon, Flowood, Philadelphia, Kosciusko, Richland, Louisville, Forest, Carthage, Morton, Star, Edinburg, Harperville, Pearl River, Florence, Pelahatchie, Farmhaven, Piney Woods and Pisgah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Choctaw; Leake; Madison; Neshoba; Rankin; Scott; Smith; Winston
